page.title: 06CLUBS AND SOCIAL IN BANKS
page.content:
I GO TO THE BROWNIES AT THE METHODIST SCHOOL BUILDING IN BANKS.I HAVE BEEN IN ONE YEAR AND HAVE TAKEN MY PROMISE. THE PACK LEADER IS BROWN OWL.WE ARE A LARGE GROUP.WE WEAR THE UNIFORM.
I GO TO BOYS BRIGADE.WE HAVE A UNIFORM WHICH IS BLUE.ANNUALLY WE DO A DISPLAY AND MARCH.WE PLAY GAMES AND WORK FOR B ADGES.SOMETIMES WE GO AWAY TO THE LAKE DISTRICT AND WALES.
BANKS HAS ITS OWN SWIMMING CLUB WHICH MEETS WEEKLY AT THE LOCAL HIGH SCHOOL SWIMMING POOL. THERE IS A VILLAGE BOWLING CLUB AND A SOCIAL CLUB. AT THE METHODIST SCHOOL THERE IS A PLAYGROUP.BANKS HAS A MOTHERS AND TODDLERS GROUP. THERE IS A GYMNASTICS CLUB FOR CHILD REN AND KEEP FIT FOR ADULTS.
